answers.answer: Really?  Im the only one who is experiencing swelling??
I have the same thing happen to me. Dr said some is normal but found out i have preeclampsia so im being induced tomorrow at 37 weeks.  Follow up at your next apt to make sure all is well.. good luck

I'm nearly 22 weeks with my second and the edema has started to kick in. Right now it's mainly in my legs.with my first by the time I gave birth I had so much fluid that my maternity charts state that I lost 5 kgs of fluid through urine in the first 24 hrs (I had a catheter so it had to be measured).The one thing I've found to really help it is swimming as when I go swimming I'm nowhere near as swollen a couple of hrs later.

question: I'm 37 wks today.  And since last week I've been noticing slight swelling on my fingers, ankles, and feet.  Its not that bad thank God, but it does hurt my my hands during the night and throughout the day.How many ppl r experiencing swelling?   How far along r u, when did it start, and what do u do to relieve the swelling?I've been really patient this whole pregnancy, but this last nagging symptom is making me want to hurry up and have my baby asap! Lol.
title: edema anyone?
